### railway_deploy

>      railway_deploy (name:str, mount:<function bool_arg>=True)

*Deploy a FastHTML app to Railway*

|       | **Type** | **Default** | **Details**                           |
|-------|----------|-------------|---------------------------------------|
| name  | str      |             | The project name to deploy            |
| mount | bool_arg | True        | Create a mounted volume at /app/data? |
